title: Explain Aatrox's Viability to me
body:
1) Entirely reliant on one spell. if its on cooldown he does nothing
2) That one spell is entirely reliant on being a certain range from the enemy champ for the increased damage edge zone. Enemy can just walk in towards you and engage and youve lost most of your damage
3) Just one tiny ranged dash
4) trading/harassing enemy involves hard auto pushing the lane because of the AoE
5) Countered immediately by a bramble vest or exec calling rush
6) Easy af to gank because of 3) and 4)
7) Looks like a spaz when he uses q, almost as spazzy as he feels to play.

Am I missing something???
